name: ej2-aspcore-samples
description: Examples of ASP.NET Core UI Controls
author: Syncfusion Inc.

scripts.build: gulp generate-searchlist && gulp title-section && gulp aspcore-build --option EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET8.csproj && gulp aspcore-build --option EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET6.csproj && gulp desValidation && gulp sitemap-generate
scripts.copy-batfiles: call word.bat && call excel.bat && call presentation.bat && call pdf.bat
scripts.word-build: gulp aspcore-build --option Word/EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET8.csproj && gulp aspcore-build --option Word/EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET6.csproj
scripts.pdf-build: gulp aspcore-build --option PDF/EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET8.csproj && gulp aspcore-build --option PDF/EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET6.csproj
scripts.excel-build: gulp aspcore-build --option Excel/EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET8.csproj && gulp aspcore-build --option Excel/EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET6.csproj
